gui.figura.dropconfirm: Do you want to add the following models to Figura?
gui.figura.button.tooltip.upload: Click to upload and show your avatar in multiplayer
gui.figura.button.tooltip.uploadlocaltwo: You must select a Local Avatar before uploading!
gui.figura.button.tooltip.reloadavatar: Click to clear your avatar locally and redownload it
gui.figura.button.tooltip.deleteavatar: Hold LEFT SHIFT and click to CLEAR YOUR AVATAR ONLINE
gui.figura.button.tooltip.deleteavatartw: Doing so will clear your avatar for everyone else, too
gui.figura.button.tooltip.resetperm: Hold LEFT SHIFT and click to reset the selected permission for this user
gui.figura.button.tooltip.resetallperm: Hold LEFT SHIFT and click to reset the permissions for this user
gui.figura.button.tooltip.clearcache: Hold LEFT SHIFT and click to clear all loaded avatar data
gui.figura.name: Name:
figura.config.preview_nameplate.tooltip: Displays your NameTag on the model preview screen
figura.config.nameplate_modifications.to: Allows the names of players be customized
figura.config.chat_modifications.tooltip: Allows the names of players in the chat be customized
figura.config.playerlist_modifications.t: Allows the names of players in the tab list be customized
figura.config.badges.tooltip: Show badges next to names for people with Avatars
figura.config.badge_as_icons.tooltip: Display The Mark â–³ as an icon %d on the NameTag
figura.config.figura_button_location.too: Location where the Figura settings button should be
figura.config.accent_color.tooltip: Changes the accent color used by the UI
figura.config.action_wheel_title_pos.too: The position of the Title of the Action Wheel
figura.config.use_local_server.tooltip: Toggles between using a local server or the main online server for online models
figura.config.format_script_on_upload.to: Format script when uploading your avatar
figura.config.log_others_script.tooltip: Display script debug logs from others players
figura.config.render_debug_parts_pivot.t: Render the Pivots from %d and %d when the hitbox debug rendering is enabled
figura.config.model_folder_path.tooltip: The path where all figura files (trust/avatars/cache) should go. Leave blank to use your Minecraft directory
figura.config.panic_button.tooltip: This keybind toggles the avatar rendering of everyone! Beware!
figura.toast.upload.success.title: Avatar Uploaded!
figura.toast.upload.error.title: Avatar Upload Failed!
figura.toast.avatar.reload.title: Avatar Reloaded!
figura.toast.avatar.trust.title: is now:
figura.keybinds.warning: Figura cannot use keys already in use by Minecraft or other mods
figura.actionwheel.warninginfo: The Action Wheel contents are set by your avatar script
